statements: SELECT * FROM repayment_schedules ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT borrower_id, amount_due FROM repayment_schedules WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM repayment_schedules WHERE amount_due > 100 ORDER BY borrower_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(amount_due) AS max_amount_due FROM repayment_schedules;
SELECT borrower_id, COUNT(*) AS total_payments FROM repayment_schedules GROUP BY borrower_id HAVING total_payments > 2;
SELECT amount_due, due_date, status, borrower_id FROM repayment_schedules WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY due_date ASC
SELECT borrower_id, amount_due FROM repayment_schedules WHERE amount_due > 1000 AND status = 'Overdue' ORDER BY due_date DESC
SELECT * FROM repayment_schedules WHERE due_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY amount_due DESC
SELECT borrower_id, amount_due, status FROM repayment_schedules WHERE status IN ('Pending', 'Paid') ORDER BY status, due_date
SELECT MAX(amount_due) AS max_amount_due, MIN(amount_due) AS min_amount_due, AVG(amount_due) AS avg_amount_due FROM repayment_schedules WHERE status = 'Paid'
SELECT borrower_id, repayment_date, amount_due FROM RepaymentSchedules ORDER BY borrower_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Reminders WHERE borrower_id = 100;
SELECT reminder_id, borrower_id, reminder_date, message FROM Reminders WHERE reminder_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT borrower_id, SUM(amount_due) AS total_amount_due FROM RepaymentSchedules GROUP BY borrower_id;
SELECT borrower_id, reminder_id FROM Reminders ORDER BY reminder_date ASC, borrower_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM RepaymentSchedules ORDER BY repayment_date DESC, amount_due ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT borrower_id, SUM(amount_due) AS total_due FROM RepaymentSchedules GROUP BY borrower_id HAVING total_due > 1000
SELECT * FROM Reminders WHERE reminder_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT borrower_id, COUNT(*) AS num_reminders FROM Reminders GROUP BY borrower_id ORDER BY num_reminders DESC
SELECT rs.borrower_id, rs.repayment_date, r.message FROM RepaymentSchedules rs JOIN Reminders r ON rs.borrower_id = r.borrower_id ORDER BY rs.repayment_date ASC
SELECT * FROM RepaymentSchedules WHERE borrower_id = 1;
SELECT id, amount, installment_date FROM RepaymentSchedules WHERE is_paid = true;
SELECT name, email FROM Borrowers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, reminder_date, message FROM Reminders WHERE reminder_date >= '2022-07-01';
SELECT * FROM Borrowers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT id, amount, installment_date FROM RepaymentSchedules WHERE is_paid = FALSE ORDER BY installment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, email FROM Borrowers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Reminders WHERE reminder_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30' ORDER BY reminder_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name, email FROM Borrowers WHERE id IN (SELECT DISTINCT borrower_id FROM RepaymentSchedules WHERE amount > 1000) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, borrower_id, installment_date FROM RepaymentSchedules WHERE borrower_id = (SELECT id FROM Borrowers WHERE email = 'example@email.com') ORDER BY installment_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM RepaymentSchedules;
SELECT borrower_id, amount_due, due_date FROM RepaymentSchedules WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT borrower_name, email FROM Borrowers ORDER BY borrower_name DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, email FROM Borrowers WHERE borrower_id = 1;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM Loans WHERE interest_rate > 3;
SELECT * FROM RepaymentSchedules WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT borrower_id, amount_due FROM RepaymentSchedules WHERE amount_due > 1000;
SELECT borrower_name, email FROM Borrowers JOIN Reminders ON Borrowers.borrower_id = Reminders.borrower_id WHERE reminder_date = '2023-05-15';
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM Loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000 AND interest_rate < 0.03 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT r.message, b.borrower_name FROM Reminders r JOIN Borrowers b ON r.borrower_id = b.borrower_id WHERE r.borrower_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM borrowers;
SELECT name, email FROM borrowers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM loans ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT borrower_id, SUM(amount) AS total_paid FROM payments GROUP BY borrower_id;
SELECT role_name, COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM user_roles GROUP BY role_name HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM borrowers;
SELECT name, email FROM borrowers WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT loan_id, amount, start_date FROM loans WHERE interest_rate > 5;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount >= 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_date, message FROM reminders WHERE borrower_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
